maddux.objects package¶

Submodules¶

maddux.objects.ball module¶

A ball object to throw.

class maddux.objects.ball.Ball(position, radius)¶

Bases: maddux.objects.throwable.ThrowableObject

leading_point()¶

Return the outermost point on the y axis that will hit the target.

plot(ax)¶

Plots the ball at its current location.

Parameters:ax – Figure to plot on.

maddux.objects.dynamic module¶

An abstract base class for dynamic objects.

class maddux.objects.dynamic.DynamicObject(position)¶

Bases: object

attach()¶

Attach to an object (stop moving)

display()¶

Display information

leading_point()¶

Returns position of leading point in the direction the object is traveling.

plot(ax)¶

Plot the dynamic object at its current location

step()¶

Step forward in time (one ms)

maddux.objects.obstacle module¶

A stationary rectangular solid that something may collide with

class maddux.objects.obstacle.Obstacle(pt1, pt2, color='r')¶

Bases: maddux.objects.static.StaticObject

display()¶
get_paths()¶

Returns the paths for each of the surfaces of the rectangle for plotting

is_hit(position)¶

Checks if the rectangle is hit :param position: A vector representing an objects position or

positions (if its a path)
is_hit_by_sphere(center, radius)¶

Checks if the rectangle is hit by a sphere :param center: 1x3 numpy array of sphere’s center :param radius: the sphere’s radius

plot(ax)¶

Plots the obstacle at its location :param ax: Figure to plot on

maddux.objects.static module¶

An abstract base class for static objects.

class maddux.objects.static.StaticObject¶

Bases: object

display()¶

Display relevant data about static object.

is_hit(position)¶

Tells whether another object hit the static object

plot(ax)¶

Plot static object.

maddux.objects.target module¶

A stationary object that something may collide with.

class maddux.objects.target.Target(position, radius)¶

Bases: maddux.objects.static.StaticObject

display()¶
get_score(position)¶

Given an object position hitting the target, return the score

is_hit(position)¶

Check if the target is hit. :param position: A ball object’s position

plot(ax)¶

Plots the target at its location.

Parameters:ax – Figure to plot on.
plot_data()¶

Gets the plot data at the targets location

maddux.objects.throwable module¶

A base throwable object class that encodes traits like gravity, velocity, etc.

Bases: maddux.objects.dynamic.DynamicObject

attach()¶
display()¶
step()¶

Update one timestep (one ms)

throw(velocity)¶

Throw an object. :param velocity: 1x3 numpy array of object velocities
